title: [gameplay] [minor] Slayer Jinx mini-gun bullets
body:
How to recreate:
Step 1: pick Slayer Jinx
Step 2: go mini-gun
Step 3: shoot something
The bullets will awkwardly hang around on top of your targetted enemy for a moment before disappearing.

replies.body:
Hey Abyssborn Genmu! 

Thanks for reporting this! We're in the process of investigating!
